ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: ... CHA (and faction) is important. you can get the brown/tan version for about 8500, the black/white are 9400. it is really worth to get two Opal Encrusted
ygData.messageBody:
> I've seen horses for 15k+
> but I think some as low as 9k.. It all depends on charisma I think.

CHA (and faction) is important. you can get the brown/tan version
for about 8500, the black/white are 9400. it is really worth to get
two "Opal Encrusted Stein"s: Cha+25, Mana+10
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/item.html?item=12035
they are in the range of 25pp to 80pp each on TM.

when i checked for the black ornate chain version, i had the following
results: normal gear (cha 65) 130k, cha gear (about 120cha) 100k.

i didn't check prices on the new mounts, yet, only saw the merchant
with 16 drums (4 colours, 4 speeds).


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
